name: CreateBoardExportJob
description:
Initiates an export job for specified boards in an organization.

This tool creates an export job for one or more boards within Miro, available exclusively to Enterprise plan users with Company Admin roles and eDiscovery enabled. It's suitable for managing board exports, optimizing data handling within an organization.

parameters.name: board_export_request_id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the export job, used to track the export process of boards in Miro.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier of the board export job.

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the organization for exporting boards.

parameters.name: export_board_ids
parameters.description: A list of board IDs to be exported. Provide the IDs as an array of strings.

value_schema.description: List of board IDs to be exported.

parameters.name: export_format
parameters.description: Specifies the format for exporting the board. Options: SVG (default), HTML, or PDF.

value_schema.description: Specifies the format of the file to which the board will be exported. Supported formats include SVG (default), HTML, and PDF.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the miro API.

parameters.name: request_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the board export job.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier of the board export job.

parameters.name: boardIds
parameters.description: List of board IDs to be exported.

value_schema.description: List of board IDs to be exported.

parameters.name: boardFormat
parameters.description: Specifies the format of the file to which the board will be exported. Supported formats include SVG (default), HTML, and PDF.

value_schema.description: Specifies the format of the file to which the board will be exported. Supported formats include SVG (default), HTML, and PDF.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
